00038 CReadWindow::CReadWindow(ListCSwordModuleInfo modules, CMDIArea* parent, const char *name ) : CDisplayWindow(modules,parent,name) {
00039     qWarning("constructor of CReadWindow");
00040     m_popupMenu = 0;
00041   m_displayWidget = 0;

00049 CReadDisplay* const CReadWindow::displayWidget(){
00050 //  qWarning("CReadWindow::displayWidget()");
00051 //  Q_ASSERT(m_displayWidget);
00052     return m_displayWidget;
00053 }
00054 
00056 void CReadWindow::setDisplayWidget( CReadDisplay* newDisplay ){
00057 //  qWarning("CReadWindow::setDisplayWidget()");    
00058     if (m_displayWidget) {
00059     disconnect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00060     disconnect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&)));
00061   }
00062 
00063     m_displayWidget = newDisplay;
00064   connect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceClicked(const QString&, const QString&)),this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&, const QString&)));
00065   connect(m_displayWidget->connectionsProxy(), SIGNAL(referenceDropped(const QString&)), this, SLOT(lookup(const QString&)));
00066 }
00067 
00069 void CReadWindow::lookup( CSwordKey* newKey ){
00070     qWarning("CReadWindow::lookup");    
00071     if (!newKey)
00072         return;
00073 
00074     if (CEntryDisplay* display = modules().first()->getDisplay()) { //do we have a display object?
00075         displayWidget()->setText( display->text( modules(), newKey->key(), displayOptions(), filterOptions() ) );
00076     }   
00077     if (key() != newKey)
00078         key()->key(newKey->key());
00079     
00080   displayWidget()->moveToAnchor( key()->key() );
00081     setCaption( windowCaption() );
00082 }
00083 
00085 KPopupMenu* const CReadWindow::popup(){
00086     qWarning("CReadWindow::popup()");
00087     if (!m_popupMenu) {
00088         m_popupMenu = new KPopupMenu(this);
00089         connect(m_popupMenu, SIGNAL(aboutToShow()), this, SLOT(updatePopupMenu()));
00090       if (displayWidget())
00091         displayWidget()->installPopup(m_popupMenu);
00092       else
00093         qWarning("CAN't INSTALL POPUP");
00094   }
00095     return m_popupMenu;
00096 }

00100 
00101 }

00104 const bool CReadWindow::init( const QString& keyName ){
00105     qWarning("CReadWindow::init( const QString& keyName )");
00106   CDisplayWindow::init(keyName);
00107     setupPopupMenu();
00108 //  qWarning("CReadWindw::init: key is %s and later %s", keyName.latin1(), key()->key().latin1());
00109   keyChooser()->setKey(key());
00110     setReady(true);
00111 }

00114 void CReadWindow::storeProfileSettings(CProfileWindow * const settings){
00115     QRect rect;
00116     rect.setX(parentWidget()->x());
00117     rect.setY(parentWidget()->y());
00118     rect.setWidth(width());
00119     rect.setHeight(height());
00120     settings->setGeometry(rect);
00121         
00122 //  settings->setScrollbarPositions( m_htmlWidget->view()->horizontalScrollBar()->value(), m_htmlWidget->view()->verticalScrollBar()->value() );
00123     settings->setType(modules().first()->type());
00124     settings->setMaximized(isMaximized() || parentWidget()->isMaximized());
00125     
00126     if (key()) {
00127         VerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(key());
00128         QString oldLang;
00129         if (vk) {
00130              oldLang = QString::fromLatin1(vk->getLocale());    
00131             vk->setLocale("en"); //save english locale names as default!        
00132         }
00133         settings->setKey( key()->key() );
00134         if (vk) {
00135             vk->setLocale(oldLang.latin1());
00136         }
00137     }
00138         
00139     QStringList mods;
00140     for (CSwordModuleInfo* m = modules().first(); m; m = modules().next()) {
00141         mods.append(m->name());
00142     }   
00143     settings->setModules(mods);
00144 }
00145 
00146 void CReadWindow::applyProfileSettings(CProfileWindow * const settings){
00147     setUpdatesEnabled(false);
00148     
00149     if (settings->maximized()) {
00150         showMaximized();
00151     }
00152     else {  
00153         const QRect rect = settings->geometry();
00154         resize(rect.width(), rect.height());
00155         parentWidget()->move(rect.x(), rect.y());
00156         //setGeometry( settings->geometry() );
00157     }
00158 //  displayWidget()->view()->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue( settings->scrollbarPositions().horizontal );
00159 //  m_htmlWidget->view()->verticalScrollBar()->setValue( settings->scrollbarPositions().vertical );
00160     
00161     setUpdatesEnabled(true);    
00162 }
00163 
00164 void CReadWindow::insertKeyboardActions( KAccel* const a ){
00165   a->insert("Copy", i18n("Copy selected text"),"", KStdAccel::copy(), 0, "");
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 void CReadWindow::initKeyboardActions() {
00170   CBTConfig::setupAccel( CBTConfig::readWindow, accel() );  
00171   insertKeyboardActions( accel() );
00172 
00173   accel()->readSettings();
00174     accel()->setSlot("Copy", displayWidget()->connectionsProxy(), SLOT(copySelection()));
00175 }
